trans-unit.source: Represents a method within a symbol store.
trans-unit.target: 表示符号存储区内的方法。

trans-unit.source: The SymMethod class provides access only to the symbol-related attributes of a method, such as sequence points, lexical scopes, and parameter information.
trans-unit.target: SymMethod 类提供仅可访问的方法，如序列点、 词法作用域和参数信息与符号相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection> classes to read the type-related attributes of a method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection>类可读取的一种方法与类型相关的属性。</xref:System.Reflection>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放当前实例所使用的资源<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod.Dispose*> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod.Finalize*> methods to release the managed and unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 由调用<> *1> 和<> *1> 方法来释放使用的当前实例的托管和非托管资源<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only by the public <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod.Finalize%2A> methods; do not call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为仅由公共<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod.Dispose%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod.Finalize%2A>方法; 这些方法不直接调用此方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 释放非托管的资源并执行其他清理操作之前<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod"></xref>通过垃圾回收回收。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>在所有情况下。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>在所有情况下。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offset within the method that corresponds to the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 偏移量对应于指定位置的方法内。

trans-unit.source: The document for which the offset is requested.
trans-unit.target: 为其请求偏移量的文档。

trans-unit.source: The document line for which the offset is requested.
trans-unit.target: 为其请求偏移量的文档行。

trans-unit.source: The document column for which the offset is requested.
trans-unit.target: 为其请求偏移量的文档列。

trans-unit.source: The IL offset within the current method of the specified location in the document.
trans-unit.target: 在文档中的指定位置的当前方法内 IL 偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters for the current method.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: The parameters are returned in the order that they are defined within the signature of the method.
trans-unit.target: 参数在方法签名中定义的顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: The returned array is empty if the method does not have parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回的数组为空，如果方法不具有参数。

trans-unit.source: The array of parameters for the current method.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法的参数的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of start and end offset pairs that correspond to the ranges of Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offsets that a given position covers within this method.
trans-unit.target: 获取的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 偏移量，给定的位置在此方法内包括的范围对应的开始和结束偏移量对的数组。

trans-unit.source: The array is an array of integers in the format {{start1, end1}, {start2, end2}...}, where each pair represents an IL offset range within the method.
trans-unit.target: 数组是格式的整数的数组 {{开始时间&1;，end1}，{开始时间&2;，end2}...}，其中的每个对表示的方法内的 IL 偏移量的范围。

trans-unit.source: The number of ranges is the length of the array divided by 2.
trans-unit.target: 范围数是数组的除以 2 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The document for which the IL offset ranges are requested.
trans-unit.target: 为其请求 IL 偏移量的范围的文档。

trans-unit.source: The document line for which the IL offset ranges are requested.
trans-unit.target: 请求的 IL 偏移量范围的文档行。

trans-unit.source: The document column for which the IL offset ranges are requested.
trans-unit.target: 为其请求 IL 偏移量的范围的文档列。

trans-unit.source: An array of start and end IL offset pairs.
trans-unit.target: 数组的开始和结束 IL 偏移量对。

trans-unit.source: Returns the most enclosing lexical scope corresponding to an offset within a method.
trans-unit.target: 返回对应的方法内的偏移量的最封闭的词法范围。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.GetScope%2A> method to start local variable searches.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.GetScope%2A>方法来启动本地变量的搜索。</xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.GetScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IL offset within the method to look up.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找的方法内 IL 偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The most enclosing lexical scope for the given IL offset within the method.
trans-unit.target: 在方法内给定 IL 偏移量最封闭的词法范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sequence points for the current method and stores the information in the specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前方法的序列点并将信息存储在指定的数组。

trans-unit.source: Sequence points are used to map between source file locations and IL offsets.
trans-unit.target: 序列点使用的源文件位置与 IL 偏移量之间进行映射。

trans-unit.source: Each sequence point consists of an IL offset, and source file region specified by start and end line/column numbers relative to an <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: 每个序列点包含 IL 偏移量，并指定开始日期和结束行/列的源文件区域数字相对于<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument>对象。</xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument>

trans-unit.source: Each element at a specific index of every array corresponds to a specific sequence point.
trans-unit.target: 每个数组的某个特定索引处的每个元素对应于特定序列点。

trans-unit.source: The caller must supply pre-allocated arrays to hold the information to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 调用方必须提供预先分配的数组以容纳要返回的信息。

trans-unit.source: Any values in the arrays are overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的任何值将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.SequencePointCount%2A> to retrieve the count of all sequence points and create arrays of the proper size.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.SequencePointCount%2A>来检索所有序列点的计数，并创建相应大小的数组。</xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.SequencePointCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sequence points are sorted by offset and are for all documents in the method.
trans-unit.target: 序列点按偏移量排序，用于在方法中的所有文档。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.GetSequencePoints%2A> verifies the size of each array and places the sequence point information into each.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.GetSequencePoints%2A>验证每个数组的大小并放置到每个序列点信息。</xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod.GetSequencePoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: If any array is `null`, the data for that array is not returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何数组是`null`，则不返回该数组的数据。

trans-unit.source: An array in which to store the IL offsets from the beginning of the method for the sequence points.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中存储 IL 的数组的偏移量从序列点方法的开头。

trans-unit.source: An array in which to store the documents in which the sequence points are located.
trans-unit.target: 在其中存储序列点所在的文档的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array in which to store the lines in the documents at which the sequence points are located.
trans-unit.target: 在其中存储序列点所在的文档中的行的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array in which to store the columns in the documents at which the sequence points are located.
trans-unit.target: 在其中存储序列点所在的文档中的列的数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of lines in the documents at which the sequence points end.
trans-unit.target: 序列点结束的文档中的行的数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of columns in the documents at which the sequence points end.
trans-unit.target: 序列点结束的文档中的列的数组。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>在所有情况下。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>在所有情况下。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root lexical scope for the current method.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前方法的根词法范围。

trans-unit.source: This scope encloses the entire method.
trans-unit.target: 此范围包括整个方法。

trans-unit.source: The root lexical scope that encloses the entire method.
trans-unit.target: 包括整个方法的根词法范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root lexical scope for the current method.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前方法的根词法范围。

trans-unit.source: This scope encloses the entire method.
trans-unit.target: 此范围包括整个方法。

trans-unit.source: The root lexical scope that encloses the entire method.
trans-unit.target: 包括整个方法的根词法范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets a count of the sequence points in the method.
trans-unit.target: 获取方法中序列点的计数。

trans-unit.source: The count of the sequence points in the method.
trans-unit.target: 在方法中序列点的计数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken"></xref> containing the metadata for the current method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken"></xref>包含当前方法的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The metadata token for the current method.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法的元数据标记。
